PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2013-13542013-12-09TC,  ,  ,  , 
ActFinancial Administration Act
SubjectCanada Post Corporation and VIA Rail Canada Inc. ** Collective Agreement **
PrecisOrder directing Canada Post Corporation and VIA Rail Canada Inc. to obtain (1) the Treasury Board’s approval of their negotiating mandates with respect to collective agreements that expire in 2014 or later, for the purpose of entering into a collective agreement; and (2) the Treasury Board’s approval before the Crown corporations fix the terms and conditions of employment of their non-unionized employees who are not appointed by the Governor in Council.
AttachmentsAttachment
